## Skill Changes

<!-- If adding or modifying a skill, list the affected skills: -->

- [ ] New skill: `skills/<name>/SKILL.md`
- [ ] Modified skill: `skills/<name>/SKILL.md`
- [ ] Updated README skill table

## Checklist

- [ ] SKILL.md has valid YAML frontmatter (`name`, `description`, `allowed-tools`)
- [ ] Instructions include authentication check, examples, autonomy rules, and error handling
- [ ] All CLI examples use `--json` flag
- [ ] README.md skill table is up to date
